name: react-node-fullstack
description: A full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.ci:deps: npm run ci:client && npm run ci:server
scripts.build: npm run ci:deps && npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
scripts.test: cd client && npm test && cd ../server && npm test
